column1: * @exclamationmark -- to remove the exclamation mark out of keywords in case it including at the end of keyword to prevent the broken layout
* @specialchars -- set of special characters except dash(-)
* @specialtrans -- to replace it with blank to ensure work with search
* @accenttrans -- convert accented characters to regular characters for fixing stripped out of the URL
* To update specialchars in future then need to also update specialtrans as well e.g. specialchars = /[®]/g; specialtrans ={"®": ""}
* To update accentchars in future then need to also update accenttrans as well e.g. accentchars = /[Ç]/g; accenttrans ={"Ç": "C"}

Home >  > Holiday > Holiday Cards

Zoom

Hiroshige: Taiko Bridge, Meguro, on a Snowy Evening Holiday Cards

Item# 80-026048 

SALE
Price: $17.95 $5.39
Member Price: $16.15 $4.85

Details

  • Includes 20 cards and 20 envelopes per box
  • 4 7/8'' x 6 1/4''
  • Greeting: Greetings of the Season

Description

Description

This elegant holiday card features a scene of Taiko Bridge and passersby in winter, reproduced from a woodblock print by Utagawa Hiroshige (Japanese, 1797–1858). It is from his major series One Hundred Views of Edo. One of the great Japanese landscape artists, Hiroshige created views of his native Japan that are celebrated throughout the world.

Shipping and Returns

Shipping and Returns
For more information on international and expedited shipping options, please see our Shipping & Handling page.

Your satisfaction is our goal. Please inspect your order upon delivery, and if for any reason you are not satisfied, you may return the merchandise within 180 days from the date of purchase. See details.
